snippet.title: Forever Skies | Survive - Build - Scavenge Trailer
snippet.description:
Far From Home presents, The Forever Skies Survive - Build - Scavenge Trailer.

Forever Skies Early Access is out NOW on Steam! - https://bit.ly/yt2_ForeverSkiesGame 
Join our community Discord: https://discord.gg/fnZYv9RYBJ 

In Forever Skies you are a scientist returning to Earth destroyed by a global ecological disaster. You will fly a high-tech airship, expand, rebuild and repair it. Look for and scavenge resources to survive, and face the dangers of the surface. Search for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness. 

Twitter - https://twitter.com/flyforeverskies
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FlyForeverSkies

Visit our website to learn more about our studio: https://www.farfromhomegames.com/en
